Review_title: Good Gridiron Murders On and Off the Field
Review_Text: From high school football, to college football, to pro football, there is murder: football players, cheerleaders, coaches, and people connected to teams. I'm a football fan because I enjoy the game. Some people and even entire cities are fanatics. From the not so famous to the famous, like Aaron Hernandez, the perpetrators are regular people when it comes to emotions. They will win at any cost, they have drug problems, money problems, relationship issues, serious anger management, they get jealous, hateful, spiteful, and vengeful. The best thing about true crime tv is the psychology and the personal biographies. When watching crime tv, always remember: The victims always matter the most.
